attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We are not asking for Cannabis to be legal. Infact we have got fed up arguing the case for legalization we are just asking for a slight change in the laws. To be able to posess upto 1.9 Grams of cannabis which is the average ten pounds worth when you are buying it from a local dealer.

Anything under 2 grams should be legal and allowed to be smoked outside or inside your house and allowed to be posessed LEGALLY.

Thanks, BenitoUK@googlemail.com

rejection.details:
Please supply full name and address information.
Please remove your email address from your petition.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
